message.content:
cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SOC, cs.LG, cs.HC 

The paper focuses on recommendation systems that incorporate social influence and contagion, which are key topics in social network analysis (cs.SOC) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The use of collaborative filtering (CF) techniques also suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the impact of interpersonal influence on group decision-making, which relates to human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
